Class PieceMessage

java.lang.Object
  Message
      PieceMessage

public class PieceMessage
extends Message

Piece Messages send a specified piece of data from one peer to another piece: The piece message is variable length, where X is the length of the block. The payload contains the following information: - index: integer specifying the zero-based piece index - begin: integer specifying the zero-based byte offset within the piece - block: block of data, which is a subset of the piece specified by index.

public PieceMessage(int index,
                    int begin,
                    byte[] block)
Creates a Piece Message with the given index, begin offset, and data block

Parameters:
index - zero-based integer specifying which piece is being sent
begin - zero-based integer specifying the offset within a piece
block - byte array that contains the data block of the piece
